audioText: La situation économique devient de plus en plus grave selon les experts financiers.
question: How do financial experts describe the economic situation?
options: It is slowly improving with positive indicators
It remains stable despite global uncertainties
It is unpredictable and changes frequently
explanation: The text states 'La situation économique devient de plus en plus grave selon les experts financiers' - The economic situation is becoming more and more serious according to financial experts. 'Grave' means serious/grave in this context.
